messageBody:
aroonkick2000 wrote:

> iam new to Junit and also to this group.i just want a help
> regarding how to write a Junit testcase for a login screen that
> validates the username and password.
>
> i finished the program in java which gets the username and password
> and check it against the values in the database.
>
> i just want to write a Junit testcase for this .
>
> Help me out........

In general:

1. Put a known user in the database.
2. Try to log in as that user.

But specifically, what part of this feature do you want to test?

1. To test through the web UI, try using HtmlUnit or Selenium.
2. To test just under the web UI, invoke your Controller (or Request
Handler, or whatever you call it) by creating the appropriate
request/response objects.
3. To test the logic, invoke the Java class that does the comparison of
User objects, or however you've designed it.

That should be enough to get you started.

Good luck.
